titleStmt.title: The lyf of the holy [and] blessid vyrgyn saynt Wenefryde
titleStmt.author: Robert, Prior of Shrewsbury, d. 1167.
Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by William Caxton, from the Latin original by Robert, prior of Shrewsbury.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
